an8.62:1.1.pli: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:1.1.en: “Mendicants, a mendicant with six qualities is good enough for themselves and others.

an8.62:1.9.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:1.9.en: A mendicant with these six qualities is good enough for themselves and others.

an8.62:2.1.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:2.1.en: A mendicant with five qualities is good enough for themselves and others.

an8.62:2.9.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:2.9.en: A mendicant with these five qualities is good enough for themselves and others.

an8.62:3.1.pli: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:3.1.en: A mendicant with four qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.

an8.62:3.9.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:3.9.en: A mendicant with these four qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.

an8.62:4.1.pli: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ nālaṁ attano.
an8.62:4.1.en: A mendicant with four qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.

an8.62:4.9.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.
an8.62:4.9.en: A mendicant with these four qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.

an8.62:5.1.pli: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:5.1.en: A mendicant with three qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.

an8.62:5.9.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:5.9.en: A mendicant with these three qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.

an8.62:6.1.pli: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.
an8.62:6.1.en: A mendicant with three qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.

an8.62:6.9.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.
an8.62:6.9.en: A mendicant with these three qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.

an8.62:7.1.pli: Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:7.1.en: A mendicant with two qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.

an8.62:7.9.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.62:7.9.en: A mendicant with these two qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.

an8.62:8.1.pli: Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.
an8.62:8.1.en: A mendicant with two qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.

an8.62:8.9.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano”ti.
an8.62:8.9.en: A mendicant with these two qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.”

an8.78:1.2.pli: chahāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:1.2.en: “Reverends, a mendicant with six qualities is good enough for themselves and others.

an8.78:1.10.pli: Imehi kho, āvuso, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:1.10.en: A mendicant with these six qualities is good enough for themselves and others.

an8.78:2.1.pli: Pañcahāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:2.1.en: A mendicant with five qualities is good enough for themselves and others.

an8.78:2.9.pli: Imehi kho, āvuso, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, alaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:2.9.en: A mendicant with these five qualities is good enough for themselves and others.

an8.78:3.1.pli: Catūhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:3.1.en: A mendicant with four qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.

an8.78:3.9.pli: Imehi kho, āvuso, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:3.9.en: A mendicant with these four qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.

an8.78:4.1.pli: Catūhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.
an8.78:4.1.en: A mendicant with four qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.

an8.78:4.9.pli: Imehi kho, āvuso, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.
an8.78:4.9.en: A mendicant with these four qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.

an8.78:5.1.pli: Tīhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:5.1.en: A mendicant with three qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.

an8.78:5.9.pli: Imehi kho, āvuso, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:5.9.en: A mendicant with these three qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.

an8.78:6.1.pli: Tīhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.
an8.78:6.1.en: A mendicant with three qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.

an8.78:6.9.pli: Imehi kho, āvuso, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.
an8.78:6.9.en: A mendicant with these three qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.

an8.78:7.1.pli: Dvīhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:7.1.en: A mendicant with two qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.

an8.78:7.9.pli: Imehi kho, āvuso, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ attano, nālaṁ paresaṁ.
an8.78:7.9.en: A mendicant with these two qualities is good enough for themselves but not for others.

an8.78:8.1.pli: Dvīhāvuso, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano.
an8.78:8.1.en: A mendicant with two qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.

an8.78:8.9.pli: Imehi kho, āvuso, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṁ paresaṁ, nālaṁ attano”ti.
an8.78:8.9.en: A mendicant with these two qualities is good enough for others but not for themselves.”

dn23:29.13.pli: ‘Ayaṁ kho me, samma, sāṇabhāro dūrābhato ca susannaddho ca, alaṁ me, tvaṁ pajānāhī’ti.
dn23:29.13.en: ‘I’ve already carried this bundle of hemp a long way, and it’s well tied up. It’s good enough for me, you understand.’

dn23:29.19.pli: ‘Ayaṁ kho me, samma, sāṇabhāro dūrābhato ca susannaddho ca, alaṁ me, tvaṁ pajānāhī’ti.
dn23:29.19.en: ‘I’ve already carried this bundle of hemp a long way, and it’s well tied up. It’s good enough for me, you understand.’

dn23:29.36.pli: ‘Ayaṁ kho me, samma, sāṇabhāro dūrābhato ca susannaddho ca, alaṁ me tvaṁ pajānāhī’ti.
dn23:29.36.en: ‘I’ve already carried this bundle of hemp a long way, and it’s well tied up. It’s good enough for me, you understand.’

mn100:13.5.en: This is good enough for striving for a gentleman wanting to strive.’

mlDocs.author: Bhikkhu Sujato

mn36:16.5.en: This is good enough for striving for a gentleman wanting to strive.’

mlDocs.title:
Middle Discourses 36
The Longer Discourse With Saccaka

mn26:17.5.en: This is good enough for striving for a gentleman wanting to strive.’

mn85:14.5.en: This is good enough for striving for a gentleman wanting to strive.’

an9.3:2.5.pli: “pāsādikaṁ vatidaṁ ambavanaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ, alaṁ vatidaṁ kulaputtassa padhānatthikassa padhānāya.
an9.3:2.5.en: “Oh, this mango grove is lovely and delightful! This is good enough for striving for a gentleman wanting to strive.

ud4.1:2.5.pli: “pāsādikaṁ vatidaṁ ambavanaṁ manuññaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ. Alaṁ vatidaṁ kulaputtassa padhānatthikassa padhānāya.
ud4.1:2.5.en: “Oh, this mango grove is lovely and delightful! This is good enough for striving for a gentleman wanting to strive.
